channel.title: City of Whispers - Tuesdays in April - 8pm Eastern US Time
channel.description:
### The Pitch
City of Whispers is a city fantasy game, powered by the Apocalypse, currently in development.
Players assume the role of city denizens in a world filled with dangerous magic, political intrigue, and personal entanglements.
In addition to generating characters, the first session entails creating the city and its factions.
### Caveat
This game is currently in development. This is a play test. We will likely encounter issues with the rules, but I will make sure everyone has fun.
• • •
### At-a-Glance
* **System** : City of Whispers (In Development - Powered by the Apocalypse) * **The Pitch** : City fantasy game in a world of dangerous magic where characters manage political and personal intrigue * **Schedule** : Four Tuesdays in April x 2.5-hours/session * **Breaks** : Two 10-minute breaks * **Venue** : GM’s Zoom * **Recording Session** : With consent from all players * **Posting Recording** : With consent from all players * **Attendance** : Joining all four sessions is ideal but not required * **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-Card, Open Table, and any others suggested by the players
**Additional information** :
* [Concept, Aim, Tone, Subject Matter](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oMPSaeo8-bdq2lFfqvsphpwP4_WAbTCH3b_-CO4r7ZU/edit?usp=sharing) (CATS) * GM’s [Statement of Style](https://forms.gle/Fd64WdaafdfE9dCe7)
This game will follow the Gauntlet [Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html)
### Sign up here:
